info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 9:13PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Powell County through 945 PM MDT... At 912 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deer Lodge, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge and Garrison. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 174 and 187. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
